name: Seulbae Kim
content: Seulbae Kim's Home Page Seulbae Kim (김슬배) Assistant Professor, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Pohang University of Science and Technology (POSTECH) CompSec Lab @ POSTECH CV Office: Room #434, PIAI Building, POSTECH Email: seulbae at postech.ac.kr Phone: +82-54-279-2259 Google Scholar Welcome! I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at POSTECH. I am leading Computer Security Lab. My research vision is to develop automated systems for analyzing safety-critical computer-based systems. In particular, I am deeply passionate about investigating and improving the security and robustness of Cyber-Physicsl Systems (CPS), which encompass practical systems such as drones, self-driving vehicles, robotic systems, and the Internet of Things (IoT) devices. For prospective students I am looking for creative and ambitious students who are interested in general cybersecurity, cyber-physical systems, robotics, operating systems, hacking, and ML/AI. Please feel free to reach out to me via email with your CV and transcript.
